channel.title: Why can't I use 'height: 100%;' on my side -bar
channel.description:
Here is the link, you can find the css in this, although i suggest you use firefox instead because I haven't tested any other broowzers yet, so.
Here is the website & CSS: http://jarod.b.angelfire.com/ http://jarod.b.angelfire.com/scripts/css/layout1.css
The sidebar won't go down, to stick to the footer, neither will the content too!

item.title: Why can't I use 'height: 100%;' on my side -bar
item.dc:creator: @Gnarly3 Gnarly...
item.description:
@Gnarly3 wrote:

How would you make a height 100%?
Like wtf, height is automatic, to the length of the page.

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't I use 'height: 100%;' on my side -bar

item.title: Why can't I use 'height: 100%;' on my side -bar
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Use this to make it stick to the bottom.

position: absolute;
bottom: 0;

Read full topic

item.title: Why can't I use 'height: 100%;' on my side -bar
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“321legend123, post:2, topic:241795”]hey mate

just thought i shoudl let u know u should try 110mb

its a really good free web hoster

sorry dnno how to help you but i noticed your hoster kinda sucks lol

http://www.110mb.com/aff.php?un=advanced-scape

just click that and u can read all the features and stuff

haha its my affiliate link but it goes straight to the site[/quote]How about you actually help him?

And usually floating divs don’t really have an end if you were to use 100%, so it doesn’t really do anything.
